config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
if [[ -n "${target_path}" ]]; then
  readonly targets=("${(f)target_path[@]}")
elif [[ "${#}" -gt 0 ]]; then
  readonly targets=("${@}")
else
  echo 'Expecting valid input or configuration' >&2
  exit 1
fi

readonly json_args="$(../.common/directory-children 'by_added' "${targets[@]}")"

osascript -l JavaScript -e 'function run(argv) {
  return JSON.parse(argv[0])["alfredworkflow"]["arg"][0]
}' "${json_args}" | tr -d '\n'
taskDescription: Returns most recently added path of configured or passed-in folder
